options.text: AI accuracy: Algorithm struggles with nuanced creative context.
options.why: Misinterpretation could lead to incorrect task prioritization.
assumptions: AI can't fully grasp creative subtleties

options.text: Market risk: Competitors rapidly improving similar AI solutions.
options.why: Could reduce market share if competitors outperform.

options.text: Operational risk: Integration issues with Slack updates.
options.why: Frequent Slack updates may break bot functionality.
